name: The Ranch Hand Mitten (2014)
description:
This is the comfiest and strongest mitt you'll ever wear.

Made of full cowhide leather which is known for it's strength and durability. The Ranch Hand maintains its integrity and takes the shape of the rider.

We throw in a bonus sachet of Nikwax for waterproofing, and to keep the workman build of these mitts soft.

Don't forget the internal fingers for superb comfort, and the idiot wrist leashes so you can let those guys hang when you're on the chair.

Rigorously tested in all Australian alpine conditions, you know they'll pass the test in all conditions, all over the world!


LIMITED STOCK. 
Full stock available in Gloves and Mitts - May 2014.

name: The Mime Glove (2013)
description:
Our stretch-fleece liner glove.
Sold separately, and also as a bonus with some of our premium mitts.


 FEATURES:
- Stretch Fleece Material
- Silicon Palm Print

name: The School's Out Glove (2013)
description:
If it ain’t broke, don’t fix it!
We are running the same glove again, at the same price.
With all of the usual features, we are offering a solution to sweaty hands or ice burn,whether it be the start of your season or the end.
The School’s Out Glove even works great as a liner and for heaps of other activities!
Still the best value pipe glove in the country!
 
With the School’s Out Gloves you can still get
that simple pipe glove you love, at a simple price!
Oh, and they’re still Hi-Fiveable, Slap!


 FEATURES:
- Breathable Backhand
- Boogie Wiper Thumb
- Pig Leather Palm
- Adjustable Cuff

name: The Generic Glove (2013)
description:
Wanna spoil yourself without spending all of your pocket money? Here’s a tip, go Generic!
The Generic Glove is the deluxe option to keep you playing all season long!
Everyone deserves to rock high-end spring gloves at a low-end price.
 
Quality Steeze Assured!
 
Even if you’ve never spent time in the arcade geekin’ out, You’ll feel like a high scorer in these bad boys!

 FEATURES:
- Super Grip Silicon Palm
- Breathable Backhand
- Boogie Wiper Thumb
- Neoprene Cuff

name: The Generic Mitten (2013)
description:
Mittens aren’t for everyone. But for those who can’t get enough, and have been sweating it out on warmer days, We’ve got the solution!
No more ripping off your mitts at the bottom of every chair..
Take a seat, and talk some smack with your pals in comfort!
 
Now your hands aren’t sweating like cray cray,
You’ll easily have more fun shredding than at the arcade!


 FEATURES:

- Super Grip Silicon Palm
- Breathable Backhand
- Boogie Wiper Thumb
- Neoprene Cuff

name: The PreenUp Glove (2013)
description:
A fresh Medium-Weight addition to our line in 2013.
The Preen-Up Glove represents value for money. It’s about protecting your best interests, while enjoying yourself!
Suitable for most conditions, you can now shred with your mind at ease.
We want preen-up, Yeeah!


 FEATURES:
- Super Grip Silicon Palm
- Neoprene Backhand
- Boogie Wiper Thumb
- Neoprene Adjustable Cuff

name: The PreenUp Mitten (2013)
description:
A fresh Medium-Weight addition to our line in 2013.
The Preen-Up Mitt represents value for money. It’s about protecting your best interests, while enjoying yourself!
Suitable for most conditions, you can now shred with your mind at ease.
We want preen-up, Yeeah!


 FEATURES:
- Super Grip Silicon Palm
- Neoprene Backhand
- Boogie Wiper Thumb
- Neoprene Adjustable Cuff

name: The Uber Glove (2013)
description:
Indecisive? Please don’t be, because we’re gonna make it easy for you.
The Uber Glove is an all-rounder that’s good to go whenever you are.
If you’re looking for something a little warmer than your pipe gloves, these are for you!
Try them out, and you’ll see just how wunderbar they really are.
They’re not too heavy, they’re not too light.. They’re just Tight yahh!


 FEATURES:
- Super Durable Grip Silicon Palm
- Waterproof Membrane Insert
- Adjustable Neoprene Cuff
- Breathable Backhand
- Boogie Wiper Thumb

name: The Smitten Mitten (2013) + Bonus Liners!
description:
Just think how jealous your pals will be when they see you repping these!
Our mitts are going to keep you warm, toasty, and dry.
Every pair comes with a bonus set of super comfy, stretch fleece liner gloves!
It’s win-win!
The Smitten Mitten will have you shredding
with a smile on your dial, all day long.
Use your bonus liners for combo warmth,
or just roll them solo. No problem!


 FEATURES:
- Waterproof Outer
- 10K Waterproof Insert
- Super Grip Silicon Palm
- Boogie Wiper Thumb
- Adjustable Cuff
- Shoe Lace Wrist Straps
- Bonus Mime Glove Liners

name: The Bomb Glove (2013)
description:
They’re warm, they’re waterpoof, they’re affordable, and they’re BLACK!
The Bomb Series of Gloves and Mittens is aimed at giving a more subtle, low key option
to warmth and waterproofing.
Whether it’s your first time riding, or your 1000th day – The stealth option is always a good one.
Not everybody wants the rudest or freshest designs of the year, so if that’s you – here you go!
At a price that won’t blow up the bank, they’re the bomb.


 FEATURES:
- Waterproof Outer Shell
- 10K Waterproof Insert
- Synthetic Durable Palm
- Neoprene Knuckles
- Boogie Wiper Thumb
- Adjustable Cuff

name: The Bomb Mitten (2013)
description:
They’re warm, they’re waterpoof, they’re affordable, and they’re BLACK!
The Bomb Series of Gloves and Mittens is aimed at giving a more subtle, low key option
to warmth and waterproofing.
Whether it’s your first time riding, or your 1000th day – The stealth option is always a good one.
Not everybody wants the rudest or freshest designs of the year, so if that’s you – here you go!
At a price that won’t blow up the bank, they’re the bomb.


 FEATURES:
- Waterproof Outer Shell
- 10K Waterproof Insert
- Synthetic Durable Palm
- Neoprene Knuckles
- Boogie Wiper Thumb
- Adjustable Cuff

name: The Hustler Mitten (2013) + Bonus Liners
description:
Hopefully you’re not out on the street corner hustlin’ people for dime, but if you are, these puppies will keep you warm. Even better, you’ll feel like a boss as you cut park laps all day long..
Slip them on and off with ease for whatever activities you’re in to.
Heavy sheep-skin pile lining will keep you warm,while the waterproof split-leather outer will keep you dry.
Suitable for, but not restricted
to the following activities: Snack-eating, hand-planting, babe-texting, high5ing, method-ripping, bird-flipping, cart-wheeling,
bus-catching, pre-drinking, dad-clapping, and so much more!
Get hustlin’.


 FEATURES:
- Waterproof Split-Leather Outer
- 10K Waterproof Insert
- Heavy Pile Inner Lining
- Shirred Elastic Cuff
- Shoe Lace Wrist Straps
- Bonus Mime Glove Liners

name: The Hybrid Glove (2013)
description:
We’ve taken natural leather and combined it with manufactured nylon and cotton to produce a glove that offers warmth in even the coldest conditions.
By combining the finest features in our range, The Hybrid Glove brings warmth,waterproofing, breathability and comfort to the table
in a range of organic colourways.


 FEATURES:
- Waterproof Outer
- 10K Waterproof Insert- Soft Leather Palm
- Boogie Wiper Thumb
- Adjustable Cuff

name: The Hybrid Mitten (2013)
description:
We’ve taken natural leather and combined it with manufactured nylon and cotton to produce a glove that offers warmth in even the coldest conditions.
By combining the finest features in our range, The Hybrid Glove brings warmth,waterproofing, breathability and comfort to the table
in a range of organic colourways.


 FEATURES:
- Waterproof Outer
- 10K Waterproof Insert- Soft Leather Palm
- Boogie Wiper Thumb
- Adjustable Cuff

name: The Baller Mitten (2013) + Bonus Liners & Nikwax!
description:
The fresh Baller Mitt features the popular artwork of our 2012 Smitten Mitten.
The embossed graphics give you a subtle hint of RAD,
while still allowing you to fly under the radar – stealth styles!
What if we were to tell you that you could get
a deluxe full goat leather mitt for under 100 bucks?
Is that something you might be interested in?
 
Use your bonus liners for combo warmth, or just roll them solo. No problem!
You don’t have to be loaded to be a baller, son.


 FEATURES:
- Full Goat Leather Outer
- 10K Waterproof Insert
- Bonus NIKWAX Sachet
- Boogie Wiper Thumb
- Adjustable Cuff
- Shoe Lace Wrist Straps

name: The Generic Tall-Tee (2013)
description:
Based on the artwork of our Generic Gloves and Mittens.
If it’s popular at the arcade, it’ll be just as popular on the middle of your chest, right?
Available in:
Pacguy
Donkey King
Space Evaders
Printed on our all new fit of Tall-Tees.Get out there and get some high scores yo!


 FEATURES:
- Tall Fit
- 5%Spandex / 95%Cotton Blend
- Won't stretch or shrink

name: The Social Tall-Tee (2013)
description:
Due to popular demand, and the epicly huge amount of ‘likes’,we have brought back the Social Tall Tee.
Printed on our all new fit of Tall-Tee,you’ll be writing your own name on the tail in no time!


 FEATURES:
- Tall Fit
- 5%Spandex / 95%Cotton Blend
- Won't stretch or shrink
- Custom Tail Graphic!

name: The Thermal Tall-Tee (2013)
description:
Moisture wicking material provides a comfortable feel while keeping you warm and dry in all conditions. 
It's the riders choice in thermal top, so get involved! 


FEATURES:
- Tall Fit
- Moisture Wicking Material (93%Polyester/7%Spandex)
- Thermal Warmth

name: The Shred Pullover Tall-Hoodie (2013)
description:
Our new 2013 Shred Hoodie in pullover form.


These hoodies fit tall, and not super wide. 

Complete with internal iPhone pocket, and wrist skirts.

100% Cotton.

name: The Shred Zip Tall-Hoodie (2013)
description:
Our new 2013 Shred Hoodie in zip form.

These hoodies fit tall, and not super wide. 

Complete with internal iPhone pocket, and wrist skirts.

100% Cotton.

name: The Stealth Softshell Zip Tall-Hoodie (2013)
description:
Our new 2013 Shred Hoodie in Softshell zip form.
5,000mm waterproofing!

These hoodies fit tall, and not super wide. 

Complete with internal iPhone pocket, and wrist skirts.

name: The Multi Facemask (2013)
description:
Polyester / Microfiber Facemask
Ideal for most conditions!

name: The Tubular Facemask (2013)
description:
Polyester / Spandex Facemask
Ideal for all conditions!

name: The Mandana Face Mask (2013)
description:
Nylon Mesh / Microfleece Facemask.
Ideal for colder days!

name: The Kicker Sock (2013)
description:
Acrylic / Nylon / Polypropoline / Spandex Blend
Ideal for all conditions!

name: The Primo Sock (2013)
description:
Acrylic / Nylon / Polypropoline / Spandex Blend
Ideal for all conditions!

name: The Budget Beanie (2013)
description:
100% Acrylic, Lightweight Beanie.

Rock it regular, or fold it like you're working on the docks!

name: The Ribbed Beanie (2013)
description:
100% Acrylic, Ribbed Mediumweight Beanie.

Rock it regular, or fold it up like you're working on the docks!

name: The You-Me Beanie (2013)
description:
100% Acrylic, Solid-Knit Mediumweight Beanie.

A fresh batch of Beanies based on our ever popular beanies of the past.

Beanies for you, Beanies for me!

name: Crab Grab - Mega Claws (2 Pack)
description:
The Cadillac of traction!
The 6.5” big claws are back in an assortment of colours: including Jesse
Burtner’s Think Thank Orange.
We’ve super sized our classic Mini Claws so that you’ll only need
a pair of them: with one right claw and one left claw, you can’t go wrong.

name: Crab Grab - Mini Claws (4 Pack)
description:
These 4-packs of peel n’ stick, textured, 3-inch foam claws allow you to customise your top-sheet giving you extra grip exactly where you want/need it.
Whether you’re getting after some 1-footed tricks, or simply looking to get off the chairlift without doing a groin splitter: Mini-Claws™ are the perfect solution.
Check out Pat Moore’s Heavy Metal coloured foam claws.

name: Crab Grab - Gripsticks (2 Pack)
description:
These are the perfect compliment to all of our traction.
Our team swears by them, and every pro shred under the sun hits us up for free ones.
Gripsticks are a throwback to the days when a man was measured by his
method (and not the number of times he could flip off of
one jump).
Here at Crab Grab, we say let's keep that style in snowboarding.
Slap some of these on your board, catch some air, grab, and tweak till those bindings squeak. You’ll thank us for it.

PS - They also make amazing stomp pads.

name: Crab Grab - Board Barf
description:
Engineered with extra chunks for extra traction, this timeless classic is coming back up for more.
The puke may be fake, but the traction is very real.
This adhesive backed, American made, miracle of latex traction is
hand cut so each one is unique (like a beautiful snowflake).
New for 2014 we’re offering a Board Barf in Bode Merrill’s Cosmo colourway, to simulate the side effects of partying with Bode.

name: Crab Grab - Anchor
description:
Grips Ahoy! Anchor your boot to that board this winter using our thick foam Anchor traction, and say goodbye to slippery sea legs.
Whether you’re a park pirate or just looking to plunder the powder,
this is the perfect traction for all snowy sailors.

name: Crab Grab - Scromper
description:
We plan to change the way the world straps into a snowboard, one scromp at a time.
Part stomp pad, part scraper, the triangular Scromper removes those
icy boot barnacles before you strap in, and doubles
as a sneaky stomp pad.
Constructed of a blubbery rubber compound developed
in the Crab Lab, the Scromper™ will be your
back foot’s new best friend.

name: AussieSnowboard.com X Radical! Gloves Colab Mittens + Bonus Liners!
description:
Our fresh colab mitts with AussieSnowboard.com come with a bonus set of fleece liners for combo warmth.

They also feature finger zip for chair lift freedom, a stash pocket in the wrist, and of course mitt danglers so you don't drop those bad boys!

name: The Smitten Mitten! (2012)
description:
The Smitten Mitten is a low profile, and multi-purpose answer to your shredding needs.

Just think how jealous your pals will be when they see you repping these!
Our mitts are going to keep you warm, toasty, and dry.

name: The Baller Mitten + Bonus Mime Glove Liners & Nikwax! (2012)
description:
You might recognise our all new Baller Mitt from last year.
But this year it’s been beefed up for extra warmth and durability!
We also include some shoe laces for your wrist so you won’t drop them off the lift.

What if we were to tell you that you could get a deluxe full goat leather mitt for under 100 bucks?
Is that something you might be interested in?

You don’t have to be loaded to be a baller, son.

The Baller Mitts come with free Mime Gloves and a sachet of Nikwax for super waterproofing!

name: The Team Shred Tall-Hoodie (2012)
description:
Our Limited Edition Team Shred Hoodies are available on special!

They fit tall!
Complete with internal iPhone pocket, and wrist skirts.

Purchase this Hoodie by itself, or in a combo with free RAD! Tee and Generic Gloves.

Your call, playa!

name: The Generic Glove! Meltdown Edition (2012)
description:
Wanna spoil yourself without spending all of your pocket money?
Here’s a tip, go Generic!

The Generic Glove is the deluxe option that offers all the channels you want!

Everyone deserves to rock high-end spring gloves at a low-end price.
Quality Steeze Assured!

2012 Generic Gloves are heavily reduced due to palm printing difficulties. Our grippy silicon palm sill works perfectly, the print is just slightly blurred. The backhands are perfect though, so if you want a bargain, get involved!

name: The Uber Glove! (2012)
description:
Indecisive? Please don’t be, because we’re gonna make it easy for you.

The Uber Glove is an all-rounder that’s good to go whenever you are.
If you’re looking for something a little warmer than your pipe gloves, these are for you!
Try them out, and you’ll see just how wunderbar they really are.

They’re not too heavy, they’re not too light.. They’re just Tight yahh!

name: The Mime Glove! (2012)
description:
Our stretch-fleece glove liners, come with a silicon palm print for extra grip, but it's nice and thin, so you can still get them under your gloves for extra warmth.

The Mime Glove is a complimentary add-on to our Mittens, but you can also purchase them solo right here!

name: The Mandana Face Mask! (2012)
description:
There are pleanty of days when a cotton bandanna just won’t cut it.

With our Mandanna face mask, you can cop pow facials all day long
and still be warm and dry when you’re done shredding!
A thin fleece lined inside and breathable mesh outside means you won’t sufficate either.

Not all of us can grow mountain man beards, so this will keep you warm instead.

Also suitable for spring shred!

name: The Social Tee! (2012)
description:
Every one of our Tees are unique.
We offer a huge range of coloured shirts followed by a huge range of print colours
which means you’ll probably never see anyone else wearing your shirt!
All of our Tees feature a stretchy fit, so they won’t blow out of shape, ever.

Please note, these tees are not tall.

The Social Tee features a big old thumbs up on the chest, and even a spot on the tail to write your own name, so your pals will know what's up!

Sizing is like a regular tee: M, L, XL.

name: The Tourist Tee! (2012)
description:
Every one of our Tees are unique.
We offer a huge range of coloured shirts followed by a huge range of print colours
which means you’ll probably never see anyone else wearing your shirt!
All of our Tees feature a stretchy fit, so they won’t blow out of shape, ever.

Please note, these tees are not tall.

The Tourist Tee features a RAD Walkguy music device, and even some headphones to get tuned.

Sizing is like a regular tee: M, L, XL.

name: The Vision Tee! (2012)
description:
All of our Tees feature a stretchy fit, so they won’t blow out of shape, ever.

Please note, these tees are not tall.


Sizing is like a regular tee: M, L, XL.

name: The Classic Tee! (2012)
description:
Every one of our Tees are unique.
We offer a huge range of coloured shirts followed by a huge range of print colours
which means you’ll probably never see anyone else wearing your shirt!
All of our Tees feature a stretchy fit, so they won’t blow out of shape, ever.

Please note, these tees are not tall.

The Classic Tee features our signature tail graphic, along with a fresh logo on the chest.

Sizing is like a regular tee: M, L, XL.

name: The Super Boot Dryer!
description:
Sick of wet boots every morning?

Our brand new Super Boot Dryer's run completely silent. 
They circulate warm air slowly throughout the dryer and your boots, removing any moisture, smells, or anything else nasty that might be floating around your boots.

Keep it plugged in 24/7, it only uses 36W!

Say goodbye to swamp foot for good!
